```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#Call packages:
library(psych)
#Tạo data frame:
m1<-NC_dat1 %>%  mutate(Prior=ifelse(Prior=="Tàu lửa",1,0),
                            Exper=ifelse(Exper=="Rồi",1,0)) %>% 
                               select(contains("Qo"),Prior,Exper) %>% 
                     drop_na()

m2<-NC_dat1 %>% select(contains("Qo")) %>% 
               drop_na()
```
# Chỉ chọn Ordinal variables:
## Choose acceptable number of factor:
```{r}
fa.parallel(cor(m1), 
            fm = "minres", 
            fa = "both") 
```

## Phân tích theo pp Factor Analyst:
### Theo 3 factor:
```{r}
solution <- fa(r = m1, 
               nfactors = 5, 
               rotate = "oblimin", 
               fm = "pa")
solution
```

```{r}
print(solution$loadings,cutoff=0.3)
```

```{r}
#Tạo object PCA:
(pca<-princomp(m2,cor =T))
```
```{r}
summary(pca)
```
## Phaan tich Biplots:

```{r}
(PCA<-epPCA(m2))
library(FactoMineR)
(run_PCA<-PCA(m2))
```
```{r}
pca<-prcomp(m2)
#Evaluate:
library(factoextra)
fviz_pca_biplot(pca)
```
